method.name: nan
nan_value
nan_above
nan_below
method.description: This method sets a given value to NaN.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the nan-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: addup
method.description: This method adds up a given amount of successive values.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the addup-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: mean
method.description: This method produce a mean of a given amount of successive values.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the mean-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: lim
lim_static
lim_dynamic
lim_sigma
method.description: Test the data on given limits, which could be static (given maximum and minimum limit for all data), dynamic (different maximum and minimum limit for every data point) or depending on the standard deviation (with a factor of how much standard deviations a data point should maximally differ of the mean of the data).
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the lim-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: noc
method.description: Tests the data, on weather there are successive data points, which repeat themselves more than a given number of times.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the noc-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: roc
roc_static
roc_dynamic
method.description: Tests the data, if the difference between two succesive data points exceeds given limits. These could be static (given maximum and minimum limit for all data) or dynamic (different maximum and minimum limit for every data point).
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the roc-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: dist
distribution
method.description: This test produce a histogram with a given number of bars.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the distribution-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: dist_block
blockdist
method.description: This test devide the vector into blocks of length blocksize and calculates several statistical moments.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the block-distribution-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: dist_slide
slidedist
method.description: This test use a sliding window of length blocksize and calculates several statistical moments for each step.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the slide-distribution-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: dist_trimmed
trimmeddist
method.description: This test trim the data with 1% on each side at each step and calculates several statistical moments for each step.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the trimmed-distribution-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: dist_boot
bootdist
method.description: This test bootstrap the data and calculates several statistical moments.
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the bootstrapping-distribution-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.

method.name: histogram_test
kld
jsd
emd
hist_test
histtest_kld
histtest_jsd
histtest_rms
histtest_ms
histtest_emd
method.description: This test divides the dataset into parts. Their probability density function is estimated by histograms, which are afterwars compared. This comparison is done by one of the following measures; Kullback-Leibler Divergence (KLD), Jenson-Shannon Divergence (JSD), Root Mean Square (RMS), Mean Square (MS), Earth Movers Distance (EMD). Further details can be found in Duesterhus and Hense (2012).
method.algorithm: Used algorithm is the histogram-test-function of the R-package qat version 0.7.
